html:
3.7.22  1:31 pm   I've noticed that when I try to sing along to Outside, the rhythms of the measures before & after each chorus are confusing to me - sometimes I can count it out and come in at the right time, but other times I can't seem to get it to add up.

     they're probably all different, if i remember correctly

      If it's not too much trouble, could you please explain what's going on there?

(So far, here's what I've got:

- I think I've worked out that "won't be late / Oh and I" is a bar of 7/4 and then back into 4 on "can't be saved"

     right. i might prefer to use 4, then 3, then 4, then 4. just to keep the bar lengths under 4 seconds

     - No idea what's going on from the final "I wanna go outside" of the first chorus into "A spaceship"

     most of this instrumental fill is completely ignoring the time. but the time clicks steady through this, in 4/4. i can promise you that the chord with the ding on the left is on the "& of 4" (last 8th note of the bar). and the following 2 rhodes notes (B, F#) are on the "& of 2" and the "& of 3"

     - "I'm gonna change my name / Oh it's a brand new day" is just 4/4,

     right

     that's pretty straightforward [although it does that funny thing of sounding like a weird time signature because you're expecting it to be weird and it's not, which I love :)]

- Oh this isn't a chorus but there's also something I don't understand from "away from the lines / And I'm outside" to "I just opened up" [The note/fill right before the verse is a good cue for coming in on time, but I don't understand how it gets there in the first place lol]

     yeah, that whole riff in between completely ignores the time. i guess it wanted to get...... 'outside'

     - "change my ways / Oh and I'm" is a bar of 7 again, but this time I'm not certain it's back to 4 on "leaving." [Actually wait, I think it is, it's just that the little triplet-sounding keyboard melody and the bass slide both happen on beats that I don't understand?]

     all of that stuff in there ignores the time. but it does click through as 2 full bars, after "plane" being on the & of 4. there is a percussion click squarely on beat 3 of the second bar to set you up for the chorus

     That's all. Big big thanks in advance if you are able to answer this <3)

3.7.22  12:43 pm   I have a family that is both toxic and rude.  Should I try stay where I'm at and try to help them grow out of their stupidity or move away and just live my own life where family isn't as important?

      in this case i think you should leave

3.7.22  8:39 am   In "i'm scared" at 2:55 ("and i'm walkin"), is that how you normally walk?

      no. mostly because i'm remaining in the same place

3.7.22  7:47 am   How do you deal with a lot of work?

      take on additional work to make the original amount seem small in comparison

3.7.22  7:33 am   do you ever consult a magic 8 ball?

      no

3.7.22  5:13 am   Our ego drives us to create in the first place; but we reach a crucial moment after which to continue creating, we must shed it

      i'm sure some people may go through that in a different order

3.7.22  2:00 am   when, if you can recall, was the last time you had a pastrami sandwich?

      never

3.7.22  12:02 am   what would you say your song genre is

      regular

3.6.22  10:52 pm   What's a good question to ask on a first date?

      what's your name

3.6.22  9:43 pm   if the earth is a ball, why am i not a ball?

      you must not be the earth, per se

3.6.22  8:58 pm   How do you get inspirations for songwriting?

      i have a basket to catch the ideas, but sometimes the basket itself inspires me

3.6.22  8:12 pm   Can you make a song that will scare the bugs enough that they'll stop crawling under my skin and telling me to burn things?

      sure

3.6.22  7:25 pm   Do you imagine music like you do math?

      no

3.6.22  6:45 pm   Are things working how they are supposed to?

      about half of them

3.6.22  6:10 pm   What is paper made of?

      it's a combination of rock and scissors

3.6.22  5:53 pm   oh, quickly answer some questions, it's the news van

     oh hi

     question 1, are you bill wurtz?

     are you

     great, now what is your opinion on, say bagels

     too hard to be comfortable. too soft to be powerful

     interesting. now, let's take a moment to appreciate scissors

     ok

     the news van is leaving now. we appreciate you taking your time to answer each question carefully.

3.6.22  5:41 pm   I am assuming that the Gsus2 chord at the beginning of Christmas isn't real was referring to Santa Claus.

      i don't even think it's there

3.6.22  5:08 pm   if you had never seen a cat before how would you describe it to someone?

      probably like a cube

3.6.22  3:31 pm   Please use the word hippopotamus in a song this year

      i'll see what i can do

3.6.22  3:13 pm   What do you do about that feeling when you want to write something but can't get yourself to sit down and do it? Mostly because you have chores and things to do. 

      you'll have to write it on-the-go

3.6.22  2:39 pm   Where'd you learn those fancy dance moves from "i'm scared"?

      at home, and in the workplace

3.6.22  2:18 pm   what shoes do you wear 

      regular

3.6.22  1:43 pm   can boats go on land?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

3.6.22  12:56 pm   thoughts on air?

      love it

3.6.22  12:41 pm   Is a place considered a space?

     yes

     Like if you're at home, would you call it more of a place or a space?

     space

3.6.22  12:39 pm   Is it too late to slip a boat into the new music video?

      yes

3.6.22  10:14 am   tell me all the countries you know

      vatican city,

3.6.22  6:10 am   how to make bill wurtz style video

      you know the part where they say "without further ado let's jump right into it" basically skip that part and everything before it

3.6.22  3:40 am   Do you believe in things like spirits? And if so have you ever had an encounter with them?

      you and me are spirits

3.6.22  12:13 am   opinion on needles.

      goes well with pins

3.5.22  10:52 pm   why are you scared of the clothes you wear

      because they are shaped like me and they are following me everywhere

3.5.22  10:27 pm   how to react when someone demands i name 5 songs on the spot from a specific artist? i am incapable of thinking on the spot like that.

      see if they can agree to alternate with you 1 for 1 back and forth, with another artist of your choice

3.5.22  10:17 pm   have you planned out what any of your other songs this year are going to be?

      not quite

3.5.22  9:18 pm   do you like music?

      it's ok

3.5.22  9:10 pm   What's your view on creativity?

     it's bonkers

     Do you draw inspirations more from positive or negative emotions?

     in the heat of the moment, maybe you can't even tell the difference

3.5.22  8:58 pm   What is the message of "time mop"?

      fill the space. just mop up the time. absorb it up. soak it in. the message is absorption

3.5.22  8:09 pm   can't stop worrying, don't know what to do

      as soon as you are doing a bit more than you are thinking, you should be alright

3.5.22  7:17 pm   why is it spelled inequality if it is also spelled unequal

      it's kind of like rocks being different shapes. language is like rocks

3.5.22  6:01 pm   Teach me how to dougie?

      impossible. it can't be done

3.5.22  5:10 pm   is it going?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

3.5.22  4:59 pm   What is wisdom

      knowing everything, which is actually only 1 thing, so it's knowing that thing

3.5.22  3:27 pm   I was going to try to put it into words, but I can't. The best way to describe it is AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH. Advice is much needed. Do you have any?

      try to arrange everything in order. this will have a calming effect

3.5.22  10:47 am   what do butterflies have to do with butter?

      they were near the butter

3.5.22  9:56 am   how you feel about milk? 

      too strong

3.5.22  9:51 am   Any advice about having burnouts?

      try to arrange everything in order. this will have a calming effect

3.5.22  9:20 am   Where are you not allowed to sing songs?

      on stage in a play which does not contain those songs

3.5.22  8:40 am   Give me an example of one way that friends and lovers can go all the way.

      you can just stand there

3.5.22  7:50 am   Is art limited by the tools for making art

      i was going to say yes but now that i think about it no

3.5.22  6:19 am   Do you like red? (i don't know why i ask you this dumb question)

      my 2 favorite things are red and non-red

3.5.22  3:15 am   Bill why are your videos like a fever dream

      just trying to get by
